description.value:
Mounted at Waist Height, can act as Melee Weapon dealing 1d10+10 I, Pen 4 Damage with Tearing. Makes Melee attacks normally or as a Reaction to make one standard melee attack. Can also lift things, having strength 50 and Unnatural Toughness (+5). Mechadendrite Use (Manipulator) Talent Applies to this.

Requirements

Attached at waist height.

Effect: Very Rare

Notes: -
